children.name: Gold: Color
children.description: Customize the color of the tooltip for gold drops. [CSTM-GLD]

children.name: Gold: Suffix
children.description: Customize the "Gold" suffix for gold drops. [CSTM-GLD]

children.name: Healing Potions
children.description: Customize Healing, Mana and Rejuvenation Potions. [CSTM-HPT]

options.label: Hide lvl 1-3 Healing/Mana & Small Rejuvenation Potions
Hide lvl 1-4 Healing/Mana & Small Rejuvenation Potions

children.name: Buff Potions
children.description: Customize Antidote, Thawing and Stamina Potions. [CSTM-BPT]

children.name: Throwing Potions
children.description: Customize Strangling/Choking/Rancid Gas and Fulminating/Exploding/Oil Potions. [CSTM-TPT]

children.name: Scrolls & Tomes
children.description: Customize ID/TP Scrolls and Tomes. [CSTM-SCR]

children.name: Arrows & Bolts
children.description: Customize Arrows & Bolts. [CSTM-ABK]

children.name: Keys
children.description: Customize regular keys for opening locked chests. For Ãœber keys, see Endgame. [CSTM-ABK]

children.name: Enable
children.description: Global toggle for Runes section.

children.name: Remove Affix
children.description: Shortens the item name by removing the " Rune" affix.

children.name: Add Rune Numbers
children.description: Adds the rune number to the item name.

children.name: Show
children.description: Show Low Runes (El [1] - Dol [14], except Ral [8]).

children.name: Highlight
children.description: Select a highlight pattern.

children.name: Highlight Color
children.description: Color of the highlight patterns for Low Runes.

children.description: Color of the name for Low Runes.

children.name: Number Color
children.description: Color of the number for Low Runes.

children.name: Big Tooltip
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Low Runes (El [1] - Dol [14], except Ral [8]).

children.description: Show Low-Mid Runes (Hel [15] - Fal [19] and Ral [8]).

children.description: Color of the name for Low-Mid Runes.

children.name: Big Tooltip
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Low-Mid Runes (Hel [15] - Fal [19] and Ral [8]).

children.name: Big Tooltip
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Mid Runes (Lem [20] - Gul [25]).

children.name: Show
children.description: Show High Runes (Vex [26] - Zod [33]). I have no idea why you would disable this.

children.name: Highlight
children.description: Select a highlight pattern.

children.name: Highlight Color
children.description: Color of the highlight patterns for High Runes.

children.name: Name Color
children.description: Color of the name for High Runes.

children.name: Number Color
children.description: Color of the number for High Runes.

children.name: Big Tooltip
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for High Runes (Vex [26] - Zod [33]).

children.name: Filter
children.description: Set filtering for Gems. [CSTM-GEM1] and [CSTM-GEM2]

options.label: Show only Flawless and Perfect Gems

children.name: Highlight
children.description: Enable highlighting for Gems. [CSTM-GEM1] and [CSTM-GEM2]

children.name: Big Tooltips
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Gems.

children.name: Highlights
children.description: Customize Jewels. Currently identified Facets only; I have not yet found a good way to customize unidentified/Magic/Rare Jewels. [CSTM-JWL]

children.name: Big Tooltips
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Facets. Toggling iLvl exclusion for Big Tooltips in the Item Stats & Modifiers section while having this enabled will disable iLvls for all Jewels. Recommended: Disable or Two Lines + Pick Up.

children.name: Highlight Unidentified & Magic
children.description: Enable highlighting for unidentified and magic Small, Large and Grand Charms.

children.name: Highlight Unique
children.description: Customize Magic, Unique and Sunder Charms. Highlight (un)identified Charms by coloring "Charm" red. The Small/Large/Grand part stays in its original color to distinguish rarity.

children.name: Big Tooltips: Unique Charms
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Anni, Torch, Gheed's and Sunder Charms. Toggling iLvl exclusion for Big Tooltips in the Item Stats & Modifiers section while having this enabled will disable iLvls for all Charms. Recommended: Disable or Two Lines + Pick Up.

children.name: Show Essences
children.description: Toggle visibility of Essences.

children.name: Show Standard of Heroes
children.description: Toggle visibility of the Standard of Heroes.

children.name: Exclude Cube
children.description: Exclude the Horadric Cube from highlighting. Enable this to fix messing up the Cube window's title and some NPC dialog where it is mentioned.

children.name: Quest Items
children.description: Highlight Quest Items. [CSTM-QST1] and [CSTM-QST2]

children.name: Essences
children.description: Highlight Essences. [CSTM-END]

children.name: Tokens of Absolution
children.description: Highlight Tokens of Absolution. [CSTM-END]

children.name: Pandemonium Keys
children.description: Highlight Pandemonium Keys. [CSTM-END]

children.name: Pandemonium Organs
children.description: Highlight Pandemonium Organs. [CSTM-END]

children.name: Standard of Heroes
children.description: Highlight the Standard of Heroes. [CSTM-END]

children.name: Quest Items
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Quest Items.

children.name: Essences
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Essences.

children.name: Token of Absolution
children.description: on Tokens of Absolution on the ground.

children.name: Pandemonium Keys
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Keys of Terror/Hate/Destruction.

children.name: Pandemonium Organs
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for Ãœber Organs.

children.name: Standard of Heroes
children.description: Enable Big Tooltips for the Standard of Heroes.

children.name: Enable (DON'T USE ONLINE!)
children.description: Show the iLvl on weapons, armor, rings, amulets, charms and jewels as a suffix. Disable this if you play online: it does not work (all items show as ilvl 1) and items with more than 3 sockets will be bugged.

children.name: Fix indentation
children.description: Fixes the indentation TODO:.

children.name: Hide on Big Tooltips
children.description: Hides the iLvl on items that have Big Tooltips.

children.name: Enable
children.description: Enable showing the Equipment Quality tag in equipment tooltips.

children.name: Position
children.description: Show Equipment Quality tag.

children.name: Indicator Style
children.description: Set the style for the quality indicator. [CSTM-QTYS]

children.name: Bracket Style
children.description: Set the bracket style.

children.name: Indicator Style
children.description: Set the style for the quality indicator.

children.name: Enable
children.description: Shorten the Superior/Inferior prefixes on items.

children.name: Prefix Style
children.description: Shorten the Superior/Damaged/Cracked/Crude/Low Quality modifiers on weapons and armor to + (plus) and - (minus/dash). Optionally color Inferior items gray. Works the same as mod Short Quality Prefixes by Jobus. [CSTM-SPIF]

children.name: Color Inferior items
children.description: Set the color for Inferior equipment.

children.name: Enable
children.description: Customize the color of Ethereal items to better discern them from regular socketed items.

children.name: Color
children.description: Set the color for Ethereal items.

children.name: Highlight Character
children.description: Character used to highlight select items. [CSTM-HLCTR]

children.name: Highlight Color (default)
children.description: Default color used for the highlight character for items that have highlight patterns.

children.name: Tooltip width for hidden items
children.description: Set how many spaces wide the tooltip is for hidden items (0-25).

children.name: Use Custom Filter List
children.description: Enable your personal filter list. [CSTM-CFL]

children.name: Enable
children.description: Enable shining Light Pillars on the item types toggled below.

children.name: Exclude hidden items
children.description: Do not shine Light Pillars on items set to hidden in the filter settings.

children.name: Low Runes
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Low Runes on the ground (El [1] - Dol [14], except Ral [8]).

children.name: Low-Mid Runes
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Low-Mid Runes on the ground (Hel [15] - Fal [19] and Ral [8]).

children.name: Mid Runes
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Mid Runes on the ground (Lem [20] - Gul [25]).

children.name: High Runes
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on High Runes on the ground (Vex [26] - Zod [33]).

children.name: Rings
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Rings on the ground.

children.name: Amulets
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Amulets on the ground.

children.name: Gems & Jewels
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Gems and Jewels on the ground. Since these item types share some of the same graphics, they can not be set separately.

children.name: Charms
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Charms on the ground. Annihilus shares its graphics with Mephisto's Soulstone, so enabling either Charms or Quest Items results in Light Pillars for both. Unfortunately Hellfire Torch is not supported because some monsters carry Torches. I can't enable Light Pillars for Torches without turning certain monster groups into a dance party.

children.name: Quest Items
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Quest Items on the ground. Khalim's Eye and Brain share graphics with Baal's Eye and Mephisto's Brain, so enabling either Quest Items or Organs results in Light Pillars for all four of them.

children.name: Quest Weapons
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Quest Weapons on the ground. Equipping a Quest Weapon with this enabled will also shine a Light Pillar on your character's weapon. Disable this if for instance you want to use Khalim's Will on a low level character.

children.name: Essences
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Essences on the ground.

children.name: Token of Absolution
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Tokens of Absolution on the ground.

children.name: Pandemonium Keys
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Keys of Terror/Hate/Destruction on the ground.

children.name: Pandemonium Organs
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Ãœber Organs on the ground. Baal's Eye and Mephisto's Brain share graphics with Khalim's Eye and Brain, so enabling either Quest Items or Organs results in Light Pillars for all four of them.

children.name: Standard of Heroes
children.description: Shine a Light Pillar on the Standard of Heroes. Since Hellfire Torch is unsupported (some monsters carry torches), this will still shine a Light Pillar when you kill the Ãœbers.

children.name: Enable
children.description: Enable custom drop sounds for the item types toggled below.

children.name: Exclude hidden items
children.description: Do not set custom drop sounds for items set to hidden in the filter settings.

children.name: Low Runes
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Low Runes (El [1] - Dol [14], except Ral [8]).

children.name: Low-Mid Runes
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Low-Mid Runes (Hel [15] - Fal [19] and Ral [8]).

children.name: Mid Runes
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Mid Runes (Lem [20] - Gul [25]).

children.name: High Runes
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for High Runes (Vex [26] - Zod [33]).

children.name: Quest Items
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Quest Items. The Horadric Cube is disabled by default since it already has a unique sound effect. To enable, search [CSTM_DSBOX] and uncomment the line.

children.name: Essences
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Essences.

children.name: Token of Absolution
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Tokens of Absolution.

children.name: Pandemonium Keys
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Ãœber Keys.

children.name: Pandemonium Organs
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for Ãœber Organs.

children.name: Standard of Heroes
children.description: Select a custom drop sound for the Standard of Heroes.

children.name: Enable
children.description: Modifies the size and background opacity of the tooltip for items on the ground and in the inventory.

children.name: Opacity
children.description: Set the tooltip background opacity (unmodded = 0.6).

children.name: Font size
children.description: Set the tooltip font size (unmodded = 36).
